mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVALTABLE (EMPNO, NAME, POSITION, VACATIONTYPE, VACATIONDAYS, REASON, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, STATUS, REQUESTDATE) VALUES (#{empno}, #{name}, #{position}, #{vacationtype}, #{vacationdays}, #{reason}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM APPROVALTABLE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY REQUESTDATE DESC
